template.template: Template AD DS Health and Performance
template.name: Template AD DS Health and Performance

item.name: LSASS Processor Time
item.description: Metric Process % Processor Time of LSASS perf_counter[\Process(lsass)\% Processor Time]

item.name: I/O Database Reads Average Latency
item.description: perf_counter[\Database ==> Instances(lsass/NTDSA)\I/O Database Reads Average Latency]

item.name: I/O Log Writes Average Latency
item.description: perf_counter[\Database ==> Instances(lsass/NTDSA)\I/O Log Writes Average Latency]

item.name: DRA Inbound Object Updates Remaining in Packet
item.description: perf_counter[\NTDA\DRA Inbound Object Updates Remaining in Packet]

item.name: State of service "Kdc" (Kerberos Key Distribution Center)

trigger.expression: {Template AD DS Health and Performance:eventlog[Active Directory Web Services,,"Warning|Error"].logseverity(0)}>1 and {Template AD DS Health and Performance:eventlog[Active Directory Web Services,,"Warning|Error"].nodata(1800)}=0
trigger.name: Active Directory Web Services Error on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template AD DS Health and Performance:eventlog[DFS Replication,,"Warning|Error"].logseverity(0)}>1 and {Template AD DS Health and Performance:eventlog[DFS Replication,,"Warning|Error"].nodata(1800)}=0
trigger.name: DFS Replication Events Error on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template AD DS Health and Performance:eventlog[Directory Service,,"Warning|Error"].logseverity(0)}>1 and {Template AD DS Health and Performance:eventlog[Directory Service,,"Warning|Error"].nodata(1800)}=0
trigger.name: Directory Service Events Error on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template AD DS Health and Performance:eventlog[DNS Server,,"Warning|Error"].logseverity(0)}>1 and {Template AD DS Health and Performance:eventlog[DNS Server,,"Warning|Error"].nodata(1800)}=0
trigger.name: DNS Server Events Error on {HOST.NAME}
I/O Database Reads Average Latency > 15ms on {HOST.NAME}
I/O Log Writes Average Latency > 10ms on {HOST.NAME}
